name: Set of 2 |Crystal Wine Glasses with Gold Plated Purple Amethyst
description:
Set of 2 , Crystal Wine Glass with Gold Plated Agate/Quartz Semi-precious Crystals



Capacity - 7 oz/210 ml



Each piece is electroplated (not gold leaf or gilded, which may rub off) with beautiful thick metallic GOLD/SILVER/ROSE GOLD



Can be used for both hot & cold beverages



DO NOT microwave



All pieces are completely food safe



Since each item is individually handmade, slight variation may occur



Can do Gold/Silver/Rose Gold finish
